DataElement.preferredName: Person Healthcare Facility Site of Care Delivery Unique Record Link Identifier
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The statistical characterization of human populations or segments of human populations (e.g., characterization by age, sex, race, or income).:The buildings and organizations where healthcare services are provided._Any place at which medical services are rendered.  It includes traditional locations such as hospitals, clinics, and nursing homes as well as less traditional sites such as schools, supermarkets, and worksites._The single one of its kind._A sequence of characters used as a linkage between related records.:A sequence of characters used as a linkage between related records._A sequence of characters used as a linkage between related records._One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.
